event BadgeAwarded(address indexed player, uint32 totalBadges)
event DailyCheckIn(address indexed player, uint256 timestamp, uint32 turnsReceived)
event GameCompleted(address indexed player, uint256 gameId, bool won, uint8 totalMoves)
event GameStarted(address indexed player, uint256 gameId, uint8 startPosition)
event MoveMade(address indexed player, uint256 gameId, uint8 fromSquare, uint8 toSquare, uint8 moveNumber)
event TurnsPurchased(address indexed player, uint32 amount, uint256 cost)
function getActiveGameInfo(address playerAddress) view returns (uint256, bytes32, bool, bool)
function getContractStats() view returns (uint256, uint256, uint256)
function getPlayerInfo(address playerAddress) view returns (uint256, bytes32, bytes32, bytes32, bool)
function isSquareVisited(address playerAddress, uint8 square) view returns (bool)
function isValidKnightMove(uint8 from, uint8 to) pure returns (bool)
function makeMove(uint8 fromSquare, uint8 toSquare) nonpayable
function players(address ) view returns (uint256, bytes32, bytes32, bytes32, bool)
